oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic standards for the future – Guidelines/signpost rather than rules
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schmid, Otto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic agricultural standards are continuously being developed, but have they gone in the right direction? What possibilities are there for protecting against fraud, and guaranteeing quality without introducing ever more regulations, which increasingly become an unwelcome straitjacket?
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schmid, Otto (2010) Organic standards for the future – Guidelines/signpost rather than rules. The Organic Standard (106), pp. 13-16.
